frame.name: Assistance
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Helper</fen> benefits a <fen>Benefited_party</fen> by enabling the culmination of a <fen>Goal</fen> that the <fen>Benefited_party</fen> has. A <fen>Focal_entity</fen> that is involved in reaching the <fen>Goal</fen> may stand in for it.
This Frame has unique Frame-to-Frame Relations: it inherits from and uses the Intentionally_act frame. This is atypical of FrameNet's frame relations.
<ex>Will <fex name="Helper">you</fex> <t>help</t> <fex name="Benefited_party">the Government</fex> <fex name="Goal">find your brother</fex>?</ex> <ex>Maybe <fex name="Helper">Stephen</fex> should <t>assist</t> <fex name="Benefited_party">him</fex> <fex name="Focal_entity">with the last manuscript</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Helper">They</fex> <t>helped</t> <fex name="Benefited_party">me</fex> <fex name="dom">psychologically</fex> <fex name="Goal">to overcome the physical loss I had suffered</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Helper">You</fex> have <t>helped</t> <fex name="Benefited_party">him</fex> <fex name="deg">tremendously</fex> <fex name="Means">by showing him how to stand up for himself and by being his friend</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Means">By bringing assistance to his troops wherever they were in trouble</fex> <fex name="Helper">he</fex> <t>aided</t> <fex name="Benefited_party">them</fex> <fex name="deg">greatly</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Benefited_party
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Benefited_party</fen> receives a benefit from the action of the <fen>Helper</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Helper
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Helper</fen> performs some action that benefits the <fen>Benefited_party</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition:
<def-root>The desirable state of affairs that the <fen>Benefited_party</fen> is involved in and which is enabled by the <fen>Helper</fen>.
<ex>Jack <t>helped</t> Jill <fex name="Goal">climb Mt. Everest</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Focal_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a <fen>Focal_entity</fen> involved in achieving the <fen>Goal</fen>. <ex>Whoever didn't cook has to <t>help</t> <fex name="Focal_e">with the dishes</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Assistance occurs. <ex>The police <t>assisted</t> Harry in finding his cat <fex name="tim">on Wednesday afternoon</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Assistance occurs. <ex>The police <t>assisted</t> Harry in finding his cat <fex name="Place">in front of his house</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which a <fen>Helper</fen> assists a <fen>Benefited_party</fen>.
<ex>The doorman <t>assisted</t> Harry into the car <fex name="Manner">with enthusiasm</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An action that the <fen>Helper</fen> undertakes in service of the <fen>Benefited_party</fen>'s <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex> Her teachers and her parents <t>helped</t> her <fex name="mea">by reading sections to her and by outlining some of the chapters</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition:
<def-root> An entity used by the <fen>Helper</fen> in service of the <fen>Benefited_party</fen>'s accomplishing their <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex>Actually, he was born in his parents' Dodge Durango, with Sheree Benefield beginning to give birth as his dad, Jon Benefield, held the wheel with his left hand, <t>helped</t> her <fex name="ins">with his right</fex> and maneuvered the sport utility vehicle up the I-65 exit ramp at Warrior.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The aspect of accomplishing the <fen>Goal</fen> to which the <fen>Helper</fen>'s assistance is relevant.
<ex>How can you be <t>helped</t> <fex name="dom">spiritually</fex> by his music, when he is defying God?s Word with his very appearance?</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The measure to which the <fen>Helper</fen>'s assistance brings the <fen>Benefited_party</fen> closer to accomplishing their <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex>The Algebra Buster software <t>helped</t> my daughter <fex name="deg">very much</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time period during which the <fen>Helper</fen> gives assistence to the <fen>Benefited_party</fen>.
<ex>Several nations <t>helped</t> ours <fex name="dur">during our most difficult years</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The situation that the <fen>Helper</fen> wishes to bring about by helping the <fen>Benefited_party</fen> to acheive the <fen>Goal</fen>. Note that this FE should normally be used only when this situation is separate from the <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex>I <t>helped</t> her with the problem <fex name="pur">just to show her that it could be done</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>The frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. A Frequency expression answers the questions how often. It is to be distinguished from Iteration, which pertains simply to the number of times an event occurs; Iteration expressions answer the question how many times.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the Explanation causes the target's proposition, but not in all cases.
<ex><fex name="Explanation">Since the earthquake did so much damage</fex>, even the federal government <t>aided</t> in the recovery process.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: ophitsen.v
lexUnit.definition: de genoemde ontevreden en opstandig maken en hem of haar er zo toe brengen iets te doen, met name zich te verzetten
